ability.End Phase Fury: Each turn, if this Pokemon uses a status move, it deals damage equal to 1/8 of its max HP to its opponent Pokemon at the end of the turn.
ability.Flame Shield: When this Pokemon is hit by a contact move, it has a 30% chance to burn the attacker.

Inferno Claw.effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

Dragon Breath.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Fiery Roar.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage and has a 50% chance to burn.
